title: FIFA bans South African official for 6 years in fixing probe
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer: Sports - Today 
A South African soccer official was banned by FIFA for six years on Wednesday as part of a match-fixing investigation involving friendly gam... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
